scenarios.scenario: System provides real-time updates to manifests with less than 200ms latency during route changes.
scenarios.response: Manifests updates are pushed to mobile app

scenarios.scenario: Drivers receive manifest updates even with intermittent connectivity.
scenarios.response: Updates are queued and delivered when back online
scenarios.response_measure: 100% of updates received without data loss

scenarios.scenario: Manifest data updates are secure and comply with digital audit requirements.
scenarios.response: Audit trail exists for all transactions

scenarios.scenario: System supports integration with a new routing engine within 2 weeks.
scenarios.stimulus: Decision to use a new routing engine
scenarios.response: Integrate routing engine with minimal changes

decisions.decision: Use WebSockets for real-time manifest updates
decisions.context: Need for real-time communication and dynamic updates in mobile app
decisions.trade_off: Improves real-time update performance but may incur higher server load

failure_modes.mitigation: Implement connection retry logic and offline queuing

decisions.decision: Deploy a caching mechanism to handle offline capabilities
decisions.context: Drivers may go offline and need access to manifest data
decisions.trade_off: Increases complexity in data synchronization, but ensures data availability offline

failure_modes.description: Data becomes stale if not frequently synced
failure_modes.mitigation: Establish regular sync intervals and conflict resolution strategy

decisions.decision: Implement a digital audit trail for compliance
decisions.context: Compliance requirements stipulate an auditable digital record of all manifests
decisions.trade_off: Increases storage requirements but ensures all record changes are logged

failure_modes.description: Audit trails are incomplete or corrupted
failure_modes.mitigation: Use redundancy and regular integrity checks

trade_off_analysis.recommendation: WebSocket is recommended for its superior latency and scalability despite increased complexity.
